plugin.name: Analytics plugin allows you to track page views using Google Analytics framework.
plugin.description:
The analytics client allows you to send page views to Google Analytics server.
A simple use case would be:
- Initialize Analytics object with the appropriate Google Analytics account. - Send page views upon user navigation. - Send event data upon user interaction.
